name: Pizza Margherita
description: A timeless Italian classic, Pizza Margherita features a thin crust topped with tangy tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, and aromatic basil leaves. Baked to perfection, it offers a harmonious blend of flavors that celebrate the simplicity of traditional Neapolitan cuisine.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Chicken Biryani is a fragrant rice dish layered with succulent chicken marinated in a blend of spices. Cooked using the 'dum' method, it combines aromatic basmati rice, saffron, and caramelized onions to create a rich and flavorful meal.

name: Veg Burger
description: This Veg Burger features a grilled vegetable patty made from a mix of legumes and spices, topped with fresh lettuce and tomato. Served in a toasted bun, it's a satisfying and wholesome vegetarian option.

name: Pasta Alfredo
description: Pasta Alfredo is a creamy Italian dish made with fettuccine tossed in a rich white sauce of butter, cream, and Parmesan cheese. Often enhanced with mushrooms, it offers a luxurious and comforting dining experience.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Butter Chicken is a North Indian favorite featuring tender chicken pieces simmered in a creamy tomato-based gravy enriched with butter and aromatic spices. It's best enjoyed with naan or steamed rice.

name: Plain Dosa
description: Plain Dosa is a thin, crispy crepe made from a fermented batter of rice and lentils. Light and savory, it's often served with coconut chutney and sambar, making it a popular South Indian breakfast choice.

name: Rice and Curry
description: A staple in South Asian cuisine, Rice and Curry features steamed rice accompanied by a variety of spicy curries made from vegetables, meats, or lentils. It's a hearty and flavorful meal enjoyed across the region.

name: Chocolate Dessert
description: This layered chocolate dessert combines rich chocolate mousse, moist cake, and creamy ganache to create a decadent treat. It's a perfect choice for chocolate lovers seeking an indulgent and satisfying sweet.

name: Idli Sambar
description: Idli Sambar is a traditional South Indian breakfast dish featuring soft, steamed rice cakes served with a spicy lentil soup called sambar. It's a light yet flavorful meal often accompanied by coconut chutney.

name: Samosa
description: Samosa is a popular Indian snack consisting of a crispy pastry shell filled with spiced potatoes and peas. Deep-fried to golden perfection, it's commonly served with tangy tamarind or mint chutney.

name: Cheese Pizza
description: Cheese Pizza features a classic combination of a crispy crust topped with rich tomato sauce and a generous layer of melted mozzarella cheese. It's a universally loved dish known for its simplicity and deliciousness.

name: Mutton Biryani
description: Mutton Biryani is a flavorful rice dish made by layering tender mutton pieces with aromatic basmati rice, spices, and fried onions. Cooked slowly, it results in a rich and hearty meal.

name: Spicy Chicken Burger
description: This Spicy Chicken Burger features a juicy chicken patty seasoned with bold spices, topped with fresh lettuce and creamy sauce, all nestled in a toasted bun. It's a fiery twist on a classic favorite.

name: Pasta Penne
description: Pasta Penne is a hearty Italian dish featuring penne pasta tossed in a tangy tomato sauce enriched with garlic and herbs. It's a comforting meal that's both simple and satisfying.

name: Butter Chicken With Tandoor
description: This variation of Butter Chicken includes tandoor-cooked chicken pieces simmered in a creamy tomato gravy. The smoky flavor from the tandoor adds depth to this rich and aromatic dish.

name: Masala Dosa
description: Masala Dosa is a South Indian delicacy featuring a crispy rice and lentil crepe filled with a spiced potato mixture. Served with chutneys and sambar, it's a flavorful and satisfying meal.

name: Masala Rice
description: Masala Rice is a spiced rice dish made by saut√©ing cooked basmati rice with aromatic spices, vegetables, and herbs. It's a quick and flavorful meal option that's both hearty and delicious.

name: Cup Cakes
description: These Cup Cakes are soft and fluffy mini cakes topped with a hint of sweetness. Perfect for parties or as a sweet treat, they come in various flavors to suit every palate.

name: Mini Idlis
description: Mini Idlis are bite-sized steamed rice cakes served in a bowl of flavorful sambar. They're a popular South Indian snack or breakfast item, loved for their soft texture and savory taste.

name: Punjabi Samosa
description: Punjabi Samosa is a North Indian snack featuring a crispy pastry filled with a spiced mixture of potatoes and peas. Deep-fried to golden perfection, it's often enjoyed with chutneys.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Pepperoni Pizza is a classic favorite topped with spicy pepperoni slices over melted mozzarella and tangy tomato sauce. Baked to perfection, it offers a delightful combination of flavors and textures.

name: Veg Biryani
description: Veg Biryani is a vibrant and aromatic rice dish made with mixed vegetables, basmati rice, and a blend of spices. It's a wholesome vegetarian option that's rich in flavor and color.

name: Aloo Tikki Burger
description: Aloo Tikki Burger is an Indian-style burger featuring a crispy potato patty seasoned with spices, served in a bun with fresh vegetables and sauces. It's a popular street food delight.

name: Red Sauce Pasta
description: Red Sauce Pasta is a rich and creamy dish made with pasta tossed in a tomato-based sauce infused with herbs and spices. It's a comforting meal that's both hearty and flavorful.

name: Butter Chicken Rice Bowl
description: Butter Chicken Rice Bowl combines tender pieces of butter chicken served over a bed of steamed rice. It's a convenient and satisfying meal that brings together rich flavors in a single bowl.

name: Rava Dosa
description: Rava Dosa is a crispy and thin South Indian crepe made from semolina (rava), rice flour, and spices. Known for its crunchy texture, it's typically served with chutneys and sambar.

name: Fried Rice
description: Fried Rice is a quick and easy dish where cooked rice is stir-fried with vegetables, eggs, and soy sauce. It's a flavorful and versatile meal loved worldwide.

name: Chocolate Brownie
description: Chocolate Brownie is a dense and fudgy baked dessert made with rich cocoa powder and chocolate chunks. Often served warm with ice cream, it's a decadent treat for chocolate lovers.

name: Medu Vada
description: Medu Vada is a savory South Indian doughnut-shaped fritter made from urad dal batter, deep-fried to crispy perfection. Served with coconut chutney and sambar, it's a popular breakfast or snack item.

name: Aloo Samosa
description: Aloo Samosa is a classic Indian snack consisting of a crispy fried pastry filled with a spicy potato mixture. It's a beloved street food often paired with tangy chutneys.
